sequence.speaker: Child
sequence.text: Welcome, traveler! I've been waiting for someone like you.

sequence.speaker: Elder
sequence.text: These lands have been plagued by darkness for far too long.

sequence.speaker: Elder
sequence.text: Will you help us restore peace to our realm?

sequence.speaker: Quest Giver
sequence.text: You've accepted the quest to find the Lost Artifact.

sequence.speaker: Quest Giver
sequence.text: Head north to the ancient ruins. Be careful out there!

sequence.speaker: hello
sequence.text: Let me teach you the basics of movement and combat.

sequence.speaker: Guide
sequence.text: Use WASD to move around the world.
